title: Gapped theories have torsion anomalies
authors: Clay C\'ordova, Daniel S. Freed, Constantin Teleman
abstract:
We prove special cases of a general conjecture: If an invertible field theory
admits a projectively topological boundary theory, then it has finite order in
the abelian group of invertible field theories. One can substitute `gapped' for
`projectively topological'. Our proofs use evaluations of a field theory in
parametrized families.
